abstract: A hedge fund manager explains how his poker skills help him understand the market risks in the Federal Reserve's monetary policy.
snippet: A hedge fund manager explains how his poker skills help him understand the market risks in the Federal Reserve's monetary policy.
lead_paragraph: Mark Spitznagel is the founder and chief investment officer of Universa Investments, a hedge fund based in Santa Monica, Calif.

headline.main: Another View: Bernanke Ups the Ante
